name: bobrevamp
title: Bob's Revamp mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

This mod changes some base game areas to better fit with Bob's Mods.
Rocket fuel has been changed to be based on Hydrazine.
Reworked all the rocket based recipes
A rework to how you get Sulfur and Sulfuric acid.
Splits up the oil chain a little, Pumpjack, Chemical plant and Oil refinery are on their own technologies, instead of all in one go.

Intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
